article.title: Welcome to the East Tennessee – Knoxville U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the East Tennessee – Knoxville U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

Enter new export markets faster and more profitably with our worldwide network!

Whether you're exporting for the first time or want to increase your exports to new markets, the U.S. Commercial Service can provide customized solutions to help you compete and win in the global marketplace. Our trade specialists in over 100 U.S. cities and more than 150 overseas offices in 85 countries can help you succeed.

Knoxville

East Tennessee companies can access the U.S. Commercial Service's worldwide network by contacting:

Robert Leach, Director

Knoxville U.S. Export Assistance Center
17 Market Square, #201
Knoxville, TN 37902-1405
Tel: 865-545-4637
Fax: 865-545-4435
Email: Robert.Leach@trade.gov​

The Knoxville office services the Eastern Time zone of Tennessee, which includes the following counties: Anderson, Blount, Bradley, Campbell, Carter, Claiborne, Cocke, Grainger, Greene, Hamblen, Hamilton, Hancock, Hawkins, Jefferson, Johnson, Knox, Loudon, McMinn, Meigs, Monroe, Morgan, Polk, Rhea, Roane, Scott, Sevier, Sullivan, Unicoi, Union, and Washington.
